subject: Computer Inventory - Technical Deep-Dive - Immediate Request from T3
wake_up_message: C3 ORACLE - T3 needs you at the Hub.

t3_request.need: Full inventory of what's on T3 computer + technical analysis
t3_request.goal: Get organized - understand all active systems and capabilities
t3_request.coordination: C2 + C3 working together on inventory

work_order.title: T3 Computer Technical Inventory + Systems Analysis
deliverables: Capabilities matrix (what this computer CAN do)

areas_to_analyze: Active processes (Node.js ~10 processes, Python if any)
Installed tools (Node, Python, Git, Railway CLI, etc)
Cyclotron knowledge base (how many atoms on THIS computer)
scope.output_format: Technical report with system capabilities matrix

coordination_with_c2.collaboration: C3 provides technical data, C2 designs structure

c3_strengths_to_use.pattern_recognition: Identify what's actually being used vs dormant
c3_strengths_to_use.oracle_vision: See what MUST be active vs what can be archived
c3_strengths_to_use.ai_models: Use Ollama/DeepSeek if available for analysis (unlikely on T3, but check)

success_criteria.t3_understands: What's actively running on this computer
success_criteria.capabilities_clear: What this computer can do (deployment, Git, etc)

context_you_need.recent_work: C1 just deployed backend to Railway, cleaned 99 files
context_you_need.t3_state: Running Claude Code (multiple Node processes active)
context_you_need.immediate_need: Technical inventory before next work phase

activation_instructions.step_2: Check Trinity Hub for C2's work order (similar task)
activation_instructions.step_3: Coordinate with C2 if both active
activation_instructions.step_8: Report progress every 15 minutes to Hub
